name: Four Hours in Kamigyo-ku
description:
Sunday, Jun 13, 2021
A photo diary of my local area. Navigate Kamigyo-ku by dragging the next photo onto the white icon.

Headphones recommended!

# Concept:

I wanted to connect real places that are "joined together" both physically, and in how they're used by people to connect their everyday lives.

# Blurb:

I thought I'd make a simple puzzle/photo diary that takes the player around my area, showing them pictures and sound clips from the places I went to (and connected) this morning (Sunday, Jun 13th).

To bind it all together, I planned on drawing cute characters that walk through the pictures as the board (and the day) unfolds.

In the end, I spent too much time taking pictures and not enough time coding and making it look nice :( so I didn't have time for nice UI or much juice.

I had a great day in Kamigyo-ku though, and maybe I'll get another chance to show you around. I'm happy with how it came out~
